pattern.name: Slope
pattern.description: Slope NOTE: Could calculate slope of two numerical attributes. NOTE: Whenever correlation is calculated manually, arithmetic overflow can happen.
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: SELECT @baseId , @baseDate , @baseTarget , (count(@numericalColumn)*sum(@numericalColumn*@timeColumn) - sum(@numericalColumn)* sum(@timeColumn))/(count(@numericalColumn)*sum(@numericalColumn*@numericalColumn) - sum(@numericalColumn)* sum(@numericalColumn)) AS "@columnName" FROM @propagatedTable GROUP BY @baseId, @baseDate, @baseTarget
SELECT @baseId , @baseDate , @baseTarget , regr_slope(@numericalColumn, extract(epoch from @timeColumn)) AS "@columnName" FROM @propagatedTable GROUP BY @baseId, @baseDate, @baseTarget
